record.description: [Hyde Park map showing a completed South Park System; water basins in the Midway; and, Washington Park Racetrack at South Park and 63rd Street. Some of the street and place names seen here were altered after the city of Chicago annexed the village in 1889. Gift of the Woodlawn Historical Society.]
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Tears along the sides of the image and the upper tip of the upper right corner is missing. Attached to cardboard back, but it is beginning to peel away from its backing. A second cardboard back with photograph information and caption has also come completely free from the image.
